title: Your Shop bugs
body: i have a really nice deal but it wont let me buy the champion or the skin. Its a 70% off deal for blitzcrank and his steve skin

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Looks like you're trying to buy something that's currently available in the normal store. Unfortunately, the way Your Shop currently works is, if something is on sale in the normal store, you won't be able to purchase it in Your Shop until it's off sale in the normal store. It's not the most ideal situation. ;_;
